HUAT-RRR

Description

HUAT-RRR (happy using and teaching RRR)1 directs one to materials and resources for learning Regression analysis, Research methods, and R programming. To access this website offline, download the whole website from its repository.

Footnotes

  1. huatRRR https://en.wiktionary.org/wiki/huat_ah↩︎
